name: Peng Pong
description:
The arcade classic Pong, recreated in the Peng Engine game engine. You can find the project code for Peng Pong here.

Controls:

  • F11 - Toggle fullscreen
  • F10 - Quit
  • W/S - Player 1
  • Up/Down - Player 2

If you run into any technical issues, please report them via the issue tracker or the comments section - you can download the Debug build to reproduce the issue with logs which will make diagnosis easier. If Debug fails to boot on your machine, please try the Development build instead.
